goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 372 KB)
indicator_definition: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
indicator_name: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
target_name: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
title: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
un_custodian_agency: The Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (UNAIDS)
computation_definitions: The incidence rate is the number of new cases per population at risk in a given time period
computation_disaggregation: Residence, Age group, Sex, Marital Status, Risk Factors
computation_calculations: (Number of new HIV infections / Uninfected population)* "1,000
